channel.title: How Can I Max My Stats?
channel.description:
Hi, I have my own server and im admin on it. How can i max my stats?
greetz, brion. ;)

item.title: How Can I Max My Stats?
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

lol… You have an error on your source. It makes the maximum total level 1980. You need to change this.

Read full topic

item.title: How Can I Max My Stats?
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

Put this with every other command you have in client.java…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sendMessage("You are now maxed out"); }

Read full topic

item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

He said how can I max MY stats. By that he would mean player rights 3 but because he said I am admin you would put player rights 2. And your exp is a bit off.

item.title: How Can I Max My Stats?
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

Actually it would be this:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxall") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sendMessage("You are now maxed out"); }

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Max My Stats?

item.title: How Can I Max My Stats?
item.dc:creator: @green_dude green dude
item.description:
@green_dude wrote:

You can’t use commands if you don’t have them.
So…I must help you add them.Add the following code to your commands :

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxall")) { addSkillXP(9999999, 1); addSkillXP(9999999, 2); addSkillXP(9999999, 3); addSkillXP(9999999, 4); addSkillXP(9999999, 5); addSkillXP(9999999, 6); addSkillXP(9999999, 7); addSkillXP(9999999, 8); addSkillXP(9999999, 9); addSkillXP(9999999, 10); addSkillXP(9999999, 11); addSkillXP(9999999, 12); addSkillXP(9999999, 13); addSkillXP(9999999, 14); addSkillXP(9999999, 15); addSkillXP(9999999, 16); addSkillXP(9999999, 17); addSkillXP(9999999, 18); addSkillXP(9999999, 19); addSkillXP(9999999, 20); addSkillXP(9999999, 21); addSkillXP(9999999, 22); addSkillXP(9999999, 23); addSkillXP(9999999, 24); sendMessage("You maximized all your stats."); sendMessage("Come back and say "Thank-you!" to Green Dude on MoparScape."); }

THEN use the ::maxall commands and it should work.

Read full topic
